Class GNGVertex

java.lang.Object
  structures.Vertex
      networks.GNGVertex
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, Selectable, Traversable
public class GNGVertex
extends Vertex

Title: Growing Neural Gas

Description: The Vertex for the Growing Neural Gas Algorithm. Simply incoporates an error variable, with getter and setter methods.

Copyright: Copyright (c) 2004

Company: University of Hertfordshire

Version:
1.0
Author:
Kevin Doherty (e-mail K.A.J.Doherty@herts.ac.uk)
